thread.title: BRIEF-Experian says sold retail intelligence business Footfall to Tyco
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Experian says sold retail intelligence business Footfall to Tyco | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Experian says sold retail intelligence business Footfall to Tyco
text:
July 21 Experian Plc
* Divestment of Footfall
* Footfall's revenue for year ended 31 March 2015 was $39 mln, which was included within marketing services
* Divested its retail intelligence business, Footfall, for a cash consideration of 38.5 mln stg (us$60m) to Tyco Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
